::Spears::
She looked at Smokescreen. She couldn't believe her audio 
sensors. "Really? I was serving them? How? I don't remember anything 
after fighting them just outside the ark." She watched as Firearm 
walked in carrying another bot and watches as he puts the bot in the 
CR chamber. Then it hit her as to what he said about Striker. Her 
spark jumped. She didn't want to lose him. "What about Striker? 
What's happened? He's been reprogrammed? How? When did that happen?" 
She sat down in the chair next to the chamber with a look of shock on 
her face.  She couldn't remember what had happened and was scared and 
confused.

Her maximal program and trainer program were in conflict.  The minute 
the trainer chip hit her, her maximal programs went into a sleeper 
mode.  In her maximal state, she wouldn't remember anything after the 
chip hit her.  But her Trainer state, lay dormant for the moment.  
But when it woke up, it would only have one thing that it wanted to 
do, continue to serve Prebon.

But for now, she was in her maximal state. She was worried for her 
love, Striker.  She looked up at Firearm and Smokescreen. "Could you 
please tell me what happened to Striker? And what happened to me?" 
She was on the verge of tears from fear and anger. More angry at 
herself for not knowing what had happened to her or Striker, but she 
had the feeling she was involved in some way.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Smokescreen/Firearm::
> 
> Smokescreen nods. "Its possible. The trainers hit you with a mind-
> controll chip. You have been serving them for a little while. 
Ramulus 
> made a counter chip, and shot it into you. It should have fried the 
> Trainer one, but it might not have. They're all still at the 
battle."
> 
> He looks her over, "We're going to have to get that chip out of 
you. 
> Do you mind coming with me to the Cybertronian Fire?"
> 
> Smokescreen turns his head, the sound of footsteps announcing 
> Firearm's arrival a few seconds before the Maximal walks in. 
Firearm 
> walks over to the CR chamber and puts BlueStreak in.
> 
> "The Trainers left," Firearm says to Smokescreen, glancing at 
Spears, 
> "Striker looks like he's been reprogrammed. He nearly killed 
Ramulus, 
> hit BlueStreak pretty hard, and killed a Maximal femm. The weapon 
> Ramulus got us didn't do anything against him, so he isn't chipped. 
> He left with the Trainers, so we didn't get him."
